title: Front Desk Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: The woman giving the interview was very degrading towards my prior experiences. Unwelcoming environment. Better off not working for the Company. Gave a bad first impression of what things would be like if hired under this woman.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself? What are your past work experiences?

title: Clinic Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview was set up by the Human Resources Department within a couple of days of submitting my resume online.  The interview was with a high ranking position within the company.  The interview was very informational but the interviewer never stopped talking.  I would have been a great fit for the position and the company but I couldn't get a word in edgewise.
Interview Questions: I wasn't really asked many questions at all.  Made the interview very awkward.

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions:
Interview process was very relaxed and easy flowing. I was asked about my general knowledge base.  Questioned about the relevance of my education & training work history and the relevance of my work experience.   How I felt regarding my adaptability, Initiative Leadership, Work Ethic,  General Impressions,  and considerations for my confidence responsiveness,  verbal expression, and maturity judgment goals. 
Also assessment questions of general Strengths and Weaknessess.
Interview Questions: What do you know about Oklahoma Heart Hospital?

title: Web Applications Developer I Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was in-depth on types of coding I was able to do. It did include specific questions on what I would do for specific code I would use in certain instances. The interviewer was very professional but comfortable to interview with. I was also able to ask questions specifically regarding the position. They requested a view-able portfolio.
Interview Questions: What would you use to secure web applications with?

title: Check-in Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: Pretty basic for a large corporation. Interview and do a standard test about how you would handle certain situations. No college degree needed for this job and it's your basic paperwork filing position so expect a simple interview process.
Interview Questions: How do you handle stress and unhappy patients?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital
Interview Descriptions: All application process done online.  Right before interview EVERY potential employee fills out a psych/personality "test" and it shows them what kind of person you are. Very laid back and easy to talk to management. Human Resources staff very friendly.
Interview Questions: In nursing, there aren't too many difficulty questions unless there is something in particular they need to know about.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: One interview. Pretty short and to the point. The lady acted like the building was on fire and couldn't get out fast enough. I was actually surprised when I was offered the job. I wasn't given a chance to say much.
Interview Questions: Are you willing to work nights?

title: Dietary Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Oklahoma Heart Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was pretty simple. The interview consisted of one on one sit down. After the interview a drug test is needed. This job requires all vaccines. Be prepared for multiple shots in order to start the job.
Interview Questions: if you have had all your shots
